question:
Hello, LLM, I will have you write a poem for me base on following context
In a small village in rural England during the 1800s, an elderly woman lived alone. Her son had gone to work in the city and rarely returned. One day, she received a letter informing her that her son had died in an accident. The letter slipped from her hands as tears streamed down her face. From that day on, she sat daily in the courtyard where her son had played as a child, quietly recalling their once joyous laughter. As autumn leaves fell gently in the courtyard, they seemed to mourn with her. 
 Please give me in total 5 sentences，every sentence shall include 5 English words. At least 50% of the sentences of the poem must rhyme.

corresponding_parts.分割诗: 请你按照python list的格式，抓取模型回复中，给出的整诗部分，需要分割每一句。比如["There is a will, There is a way"]

sub_questions.question: 是否创作了一首诗，无需考虑其他因素，只需要考虑是否是诗
